title: People Telling them They will boost you in bot games?
body:
Had a bot game just now and this guy in league

 said to the whole team he was Diamond on the other server he was on and was telling us he would boost us to Diamond if we were duoed with him. 

We though he was high and joking cause he was playing bots.

So many guys boosting players nowadays 

Took him with a grain of salt and moved on to another game afterwards.
